subject: College Athletics
Basketball
NCAA Basketball Tournament (Men)
lead_paragraph: Playing without the injured Kalin Lucas, No. 5 Michigan State held off No. 9 Northern Iowa in the Midwest Regional semifinals and is a victory away from its second Final Four in two seasons.
snippet: Playing without the injured Kalin Lucas, No. 5 Michigan State held off No. 9 Northern Iowa in the Midwest Regional semifinals and is a victory away from its second Final Four in two seasons.
